comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Fixed in revision 1043618 and merged to the 2.2 branch in revision 1043623.

description:
There are a few notable problems in Tika 0.8, namely TIKA-548 and TIKA-556, that may adversely affect users of Jackrabbit 2.2.

Since we don't have a Tika 0.9 release available yet, I'll add workarounds for these issues in Jackrabbit.
